info.title: TheUntitledProject
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
The Untitled Project is an open world first person cyberpunk action RPG set in a procedurally generated city. It is still in the very early stages of development.

Controls:
Analog stick = Move
IR pointer = turn
A button = jump

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com
